channel.title: Kingdom of chaos
channel.description:
Hey,
Well i thought ill make a 2d morpg game for the boredom iam at lol.
Thanks to http://reinerstileset.4players.de For all the pixel art they have got to make this project to go forwards with there pixels :)
Basicly.. what the game is going to try and do is a Pvp and pvn system along with shops and drops and such stuff like that...
Things what has been done atm:
Player Loaded: Landscapes loaded when going into a new area *Still a bit buggy due to the fact iam just replacing the image whats on me atm* Npc movment Shops *Basic*
Todo: Fix the landscapes Add better shop system Add combat systems
Well heres some pictures of it atm
Image of the player npc and landscape [img]http://img123.imageshack.us/img123/8118/tx20081203004940ht0.jpg[/img]
Of the new map loading when going into a diffent area as you can see its still buggy because it shows the npc in the same area i will fix tomoz [img]http://img123.imageshack.us/img123/1107/tx20081203005020tk8.png[/img]
Move if incorrect section
